ModMetaData.name: Rename Everything Continued!
ModMetaData.author: DatNoobDoe
ModMetaData.description:
With this revolutionary mod, you can now rename almost anything that you can select - whether they are weapons, your favourite turret or a random tree! You can also recolour the labels of anything that you can rename too.
Big thanks to the author of the original mod, XeoNovaDan.
